name: Opizo
author: Opizo

sections.description:
OPIZO Free URL forwarding service (URL redirection) allowing anyone to shorten any existing URL You can custom your link – set password, number of uses, expire date.
Opizo is a system for shrink urls and make money from shrinked links.
This plugin provided easy way to use opizo services in wordpress sites and blogs.

Features:

  • Easily Active or Deactive and return original urls.
  • Shrink urls in posts and convert urls to revenue.
  • Shrink urls in old and new posts.
  • Support Post Types.
  • Shrink urls directly.
  • Income statics chart in dashboard

Translations:

  • English
  • Persian
sections.installation:
1. Upload opizo.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Unzip it.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. A meta box add to new post screen.
    *. You must register in http://opizo.com and get an API Code.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload opizo.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Unzip it.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. A meta box add to new post screen.
    *. You must register in http://opizo.com and get an API Code.

It possible return back original urls any time

Yes, deactive plugin in Settings page.

I can convert urls in my old posts

Yes, For shrinking URLs in old posts, go to Post lists, select desired posts then select “Shrink links by Opizo” from Bulk Actions, then go to “Shrink Old Posts” page and press “Start Shrinking” button.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • add ability to shrink links in old posts
  • add ability to delete shrinked link(s) from post
  • improve link extraction algorithm

1.1.2

  • fix shrink bug

1.1.1

  • fix some bug

1.1.0

  • add active deactive feature
  • add list of shrinked urls

1.0.0

Initial release
